descriptions: Never uses appropriate protective gear, even when reminded.
Rarely uses appropriate protective gear and requires frequent reminders.
Inconsistently uses appropriate protective gear; sometimes forgets or needs reminders.
Mostly uses appropriate protective gear but occasionally needs a reminder or makes an exception.
Consistently uses appropriate protective gear in most situations, demonstrating good habits.
Always uses appropriate protective gear without prompting and encourages others to do the same, setting a positive example.
Demonstrates no understanding of the risks associated with not using protective gear.
Has a limited understanding of the risks involved and cannot articulate them clearly.
Understands some of the risks but may underestimate their potential impact.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of most risks associated with activities and protective gear.
Clearly articulates and understands the specific risks associated with various activities and the importance of protective gear.
Exhibits comprehensive knowledge of risks, can explain the science behind them, and advocates for safety awareness.
Shows no commitment to personal safety regarding protective gear use.
Expresses minimal interest in personal safety and requires external pressure to use protective gear.
Acknowledges the importance of personal safety but doesn't always prioritize it in practice.
Demonstrates a general commitment to personal safety but may occasionally take unnecessary risks.
Actively prioritizes personal safety by consistently using protective gear and making safe choices.
Exhibits an unwavering commitment to personal safety and proactively promotes a culture of safety among peers.
